instruction: Generate a product description for an electric scooter.
output: Introducing the newest electric scooter! Featuring top-of-the-line technology and high performance, this scooter is the perfect choice for anyone looking to get around town quickly and in style. Its lightweight and durable design allow you to take it wherever you need to go. It has a powerful motor that can reach speeds up to 15 mph and a long-lasting battery life for extended use. It also has a convenient foldable design for easy storage and portability. With its sleek and modern look, it's sure to turn heads wherever you go. Get yours today and see what you've been missing!
